Titulo: Probing Oxide Ion Conductivity in Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BiFeO3-BaTiO3-Based Ferroelectric Materials

Sentencas: (NBT) is a well-known lead-free perovskite that exhibits ferroelectricity below 300 degrees C. NBT and certain other ferroelectrics, e.g., Bi4Ti3O12, show oxide ionic conductivity on the order of 10-2 S cm-1 at elevated temperatures of 650 degrees C.
Titulo: Probing Oxide Ion Conductivity in Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BiFeO3-BaTiO3-Based Ferroelectric Materials

Sentencas: The origin of ionic conductivity in these ferroelectric oxides has been explained in terms of bismuth deficiency and oxygen vacancy in the perovskite.
Titulo: Probing Oxide Ion Conductivity in Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BiFeO3-BaTiO3-Based Ferroelectric Materials

Sentencas: There is a quest for materials as electrolytes with higher ionic conductivity and at temperatures below 650 degrees C. NBT-based ferroelectrics have been proposed to be one such candidate for low-temperature ionic conductors as electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Probing Oxide Ion Conductivity in Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BiFeO3-BaTiO3-Based Ferroelectric Materials

Sentencas: In this work, we have explored Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BaTiO3-BiFeO3 and studied the effect of composition on the conductivity behavior using impedance and modulus spectroscopy.
Titulo: Probing Oxide Ion Conductivity in Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BiFeO3-BaTiO3-Based Ferroelectric Materials

Sentencas: We explain the nature of conductivity using the dependence of impedance on the partial pressure of oxygen.
Titulo: Probing Oxide Ion Conductivity in Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BiFeO3-BaTiO3-Based Ferroelectric Materials

Sentencas: At a low BaTiO3 content, the composition Na0.45Bi0.49Ba0.05Fe0.05Mg0.019Ti0.931O3-delta (NBBTF-C) forms with a rhombohedral structure and shows an ionic conductivity of similar to 1.02 x 10-3 S cm-1 at 600 degrees C, which is similar to that of NBT.
Titulo: Probing Oxide Ion Conductivity in Na0.5Bi0.5TiO3-BiFeO3-BaTiO3-Based Ferroelectric Materials
